title: How to Remove an App from the Mac Notification Center

steps.title: Click on the Apple icon.
steps.content: Click on the Apple icon. It's the Apple logo in the top left corner of the menu bar.

steps.title: Click the "Notifications" icon.
steps.content: Click the "Notifications" icon. It looks like a grey square with a red dot in one corner.

steps.title: Click on an app from the left side of the window.
steps.content: Click on an app from the left side of the window.

steps.title: Click on the "Show in Notification Center" check box to uncheck it.
steps.content: Click on the "Show in Notification Center" check box to uncheck it. It's on the right side of the Notifications window.

steps.title: Click the red "x" button.
steps.content: Click the red "x" button. The app will no longer appear in your Notification Center.
